quests.name: Uncover the Origin of the Starfalls
quests.description: Embark on a perilous journey to uncover the enigmatic origin of the 'Starfalls' on the high plateau. Investigate the 'Meteorite Craters' and confront 'Stellar Guardians' who protect the celestial fragments. Decode ancient 'Starfall Tablets' to reveal the plateau's secrets.

quests.name: Harness the Power of Falling Stars
quests.description: Learn to harness the mystical power of the 'Falling Stars' that impact the plateau. Seek guidance from the 'Starfall Sages' and protect the 'Starforged Altar' from threats. Collect 'Starshard Crystals' to amplify your abilities and confront 'Starfall Beasts.'

quests.name: Avert the Celestial Cataclysm
quests.description: Prevent an impending 'Celestial Cataclysm' that threatens the plateau. Defend against 'Meteorite Elementals' attempting to destabilize the area. Seek help from the 'Elder Astrologer' and decipher celestial signs to predict meteorite impacts.

quests.name: Guardian of the Cosmic Nexus
quests.description: Become the 'Guardian of the Cosmic Nexus,' a vital source of energy on the plateau. Confront 'Cosmic Guardians' and safeguard the 'Nexus Crystals.' Activate the 'Cosmic Keystone' to maintain balance amidst the starfalls.

quests.name: Ride the Falling Stars
quests.description: Experience the thrill of riding 'Falling Stars' across the plateau's otherworldly landscapes. Seek the assistance of 'Starfall Riders' and prove your skill in 'Starfall Races.' Collect 'Astral Runes' to enhance your starfall riding abilities.
